weekly_top_story.headline: China Sends Its Youngest Astronaut, 4 Lab Mice To Space
weekly_top_story.summary: China successfully launched its Shenzhou-21 mission to the Tiangong space station, marking a milestone with its youngest astronaut and advancing its space research capabilities.

stories.headline: Trump Rejects Resuming Canada Trade Talks After Ad Dispute
stories.summary: US President Donald Trump has declined to restart trade negotiations with Canada following a diplomatic row over a controversial ad, escalating tensions between the two nations.

stories.headline: Solid Gold Toilet Up for Auction with $10 Million Starting Price
stories.summary: Sotheby’s is auctioning a solid gold toilet sculpture by Maurizio Cattelan, highlighting the intersection of art, luxury, and global wealth trends.

stories.headline: Dozens of New Species, Including 'Death Ball' Sponge, Discovered in Southern Ocean
stories.summary: Scientists have identified dozens of previously unknown marine species in the Southern Ocean, expanding our understanding of biodiversity in one of Earth’s most remote ecosystems.
